ovdesc.p: Application is required to define the parameters and method for the appropriate Provision calculation for each loan based upon the Classification applicable for a contract.
It will be held by date, it defines the parameters required for the Provisioning calculation, for each Provision type(i.e. the type of Balance), it defines :
1. type of calculation (IFRS or Standard Provisioning)
2. percentages used in process (IFRS or loan provisioning) for each classification,
An additional PV.PROFILE.XREF is required to hold the list of dates held for the PV.PROFILE Id.

Trigger to generate individual loan impairment.
Possible Values are:
AUTO - This is to impair the contract automatically
MANUAL - This is if individual impairment will be done manually, it will raise an IFRS.DATA.CAPTURE record in IHLD.
Blank - Individual impairment is not required.
Indicates whether the provision amount calculation will be done via a percentage (as specified in the following multivalue set), via IFRS cashflows, or via a user API routine.
The possible values are:
API: If calculation is done through an API
IFRS: If Calculation is done for IFRS provisioning
PERCENTAGE: If Calculation is done for Loan Provisioning
